alert.note: Alert for Hart (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 8:28PM EST until February 05 at 8:12AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Munfordville affecting Hart County. .Heavy rain the past few days will cause the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Munfordville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Water enters city park under US 31W bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 27.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 28.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage overnight. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
